title: Spectator Out Loud: Ian Williams, Fiona Mountford and Deborah Ross
description: On this episode, author and journalist Ian Williams starts by looks at how China is using tech to expand its reach. (00:45) Then, Fiona Mountford reflects on how to deal with grief. (12:00) Finally, Deborah Ross reviews the Oscar-nominated Promising Young Woman, 'a wonderfully clever, darkly funny, stomach-knotting' revenge-thriller. (18:10)
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
